content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
RISK-ON: Low volatility (Vol: 15.1%) and broad participation (Breadth: 6/8 sectors positive) supporting risk appetite.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
Retail & Food ABOVE TREND: CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND, ULKER (1W: +18.41% | 1M: +21.92%) ABOVE TREND; Heavy Industry ABOVE TREND: ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND; Holding & Investment ABOVE TREND: KCHOL (1W: +6.14% | 1M: +11.73%) ABOVE TREND.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Banking & Finance CORRECTION/BELOW TREND: ISCTR (1W: -2.00% | 1M: +1.72%) CORRECTION, YKBNK (1W: -3.83% | 1M: -0.60%) BELOW TREND; Transportation WEAK: PGSUS (1W: -1.56% | 1M: -3.63%) BELOW TREND, TAVHL (1W: -0.61% | 1M: +6.42%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND; ULKER (1W: +18.41% | 1M: +21.92%) ABOVE TREND; TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND; MGROS (1W: +9.71% | 1M: +20.28%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
YKBNK (1W: -3.83% | 1M: -0.60%) BELOW TREND; TSKB (1W: -3.76% | 1M: -0.08%) BELOW TREND; TKFEN (1W: -2.57% | 1M: -4.56%) BELOW TREND; KONTR (1W: -2.32% | 1M: -24.36%) BELOW TREND; PGSUS (1W: -1.56% | 1M: -3.63%) BELOW TREND.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
High momentum names are CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND, ULKER (1W: +18.41% | 1M: +21.92%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND, MGROS (1W: +9.71% | 1M: +20.28%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Mixed-to-soft: AKBNK (1W: +1.49% | 1M: +5.94%) ABOVE TREND; GARAN (1W: -0.48% | 1M: +3.28%) CORRECTION; ISCTR (1W: -2.00% | 1M: +1.72%) CORRECTION; YKBNK (1W: -3.83% | 1M: -0.60%) BELOW TREND; HALKB (1W: -0.92% | 1M: +15.57%) CORRECTION; VAKBN (1W: -1.53% | 1M: +7.87%) CORRECTION; TSKB (1W: -3.76% | 1M: -0.08%) BELOW TREND.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Constructive across autos and defense: EREGL (1W: +5.68% | 1M: +5.51%) ABOVE TREND; FROTO (1W: +7.06% | 1M: +8.38%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +4.26% | 1M: +16.31%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND; KRDMD and ARCLK showing sector tailwinds but watch valuation.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Cyclical rebound intact: TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +7.30% | 1M: +21.68%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (quant leader) TRMET (1W: +X% | 1M: +X%) ABOVE TREND â€” (note: include TRMET in model rankings; monitor PETKM (1W: +X% | 1M: +X%) and GUBRF (1W: -2.40% | 1M: +14.03%) CORRECTION). 

(Note: TRMET and PETKM 1W/1M figures not listed in full detail above; focus on TUPRS, TRALT, GUBRF, SASA (1W: +1.27% | 1M: -16.14%) RECOVERY, SISE (1W: +1.12% | 1M: +0.10%) ABOVE TREND.)

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
Risk-on stance: overweight Retail & Food, Energy & Chemicals and cyclical industrials; trim exposure to lagging banks and selective transportation names; maintain cash for pullbacks given stretched movers.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND; TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND; TCELL (1W: +7.73% | 1M: +5.67%) ABOVE TREND; KCHOL (1W: +6.14% | 1M: +11.73%) ABOVE TREND.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Retail & Food (momentum and quant leadership), Energy & Chemicals (oil/pricing sensitivity), Heavy Industry/Autos (earnings and cyclical flow).

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
XU100 is in a risk-on posture; watch breach of near-term support for a 5-7% pullback and resistance near recent highs for continuation; monitor Turkish macro (CPI, CBT remarks), FX moves, oil and global rates as primary triggers.

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

Low volatility and broad sector participation keep the market in RISK-ON; Retail, Energy and cyclicals lead while banks and transportation lag. Trade overweight cyclicals and quality momentum names but protect gains ahead of macro and FX catalysts.
